pull.title: [qa] Fix race condition in example_test.py
pull.body: There's a race between sending a getdata for a bunch of blocks with the node receiving those blocks from a peer, which could cause test failure.  Fix this.

events.body: Motivated by observing this race caused an appveyor test failure on another PR (https://ci.appveyor.com/project/DrahtBot/bitcoin/builds/26218741).

Code review ACK d9ab0ffa386f2dd8d05852563d5011b3cb501df8.

Good catch!

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -186,12 +186,15 @@ def run_test(self):
         self.log.info("Connect node2 and node1")
         connect_nodes(self.nodes[1], 2)
 
+        self.log.info("Wait for node2 to receive all the blocks from node1")
+        self.sync_all()
comments.body: Could be `self.sync_blocks()` as the comment implies?
